meanings.definition: Does not require or ask for something.
meanings.sent1: She nondemands any special treatment from her friends.
meanings.sent3: The cat nondemands to be let outside every five minutes.
meanings.sent4: His calm demeanor nondemands attention from everyone around him.
meanings.sent5: The flower nondemands water to bloom beautifully.

meanings.sent1: The nondemands child quietly played with her toys.
meanings.sent2: He appreciated her nondemands attitude during the meeting.
meanings.sent3: The nondemands student never asked for extra help.
meanings.sent4: The nondemands boss led by example, never pressuring his team.
meanings.sent5: Her nondemands nature made her a calming presence in the room.

meanings.sent1: The nondemands task was completed quickly.
meanings.sent2: The nondemands job allowed for a flexible schedule.
meanings.sent3: The nondemands schedule gave her time to relax.
meanings.sent4: The nondemands project was a refreshing change of pace.
meanings.sent5: His nondemands approach to life kept stress at bay.
